formal_statement:
lemma imo_1977_p6_1
  (case h)
  (f : ℕ → ℕ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (n : ℕ), (0 : ℕ) < f n)
  (h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ), (0 : ℕ) < n → f (f n) < f (n + (1 : ℕ)))
  (hn✝ : (0 : ℕ) < n✝)
  (n : ℕ)
  (ih : ∀ m < n, (0 : ℕ) < m → f m = m)
  (hn : (0 : ℕ) < n) :
  f n = n := by
